mapper.select: SELECT TCO.comment_no ,TCO.member_no ,TCO.post_no ,TCO.text ,TCO.createdt ,TMB.login_id AS login_id FROM dbo.comment AS TCO INNER JOIN dbo.member AS TMB ON TCO.member_no = TMB.member_no;

SELECT TCO.comment_no ,TCO.member_no ,TCO.post_no ,TCO.text ,TCO.createdt ,TMB.login_id AS login_id FROM dbo.comment AS TCO INNER JOIN dbo.member AS TMB ON TCO.member_no = TMB.member_no WHERE TCO.post_no = ${postNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (member_no, post_no, text, delete_yn) VALUES(${memberNo},${postNo},#{text},#{deleteYN})
